name: Hostile Specialist
description:
Gameplay

Rush to the field and outlive any specialist you met!

Lore

In the year 2420,  scientist has developed a way to time travel to the past. Due to multiple adjustment of decision making in the past, the earth is now on the brink of collapse as the fabric of the universe is being folded and distorted more and more as the time progresses which led to an unfortunate event called "Kok Ilang" where random people are swallowed by the universe's fabric and being brought to a random place in a random timeline.

Few years after the incident, a boy is reported to be lost and missing. This is suspected to be caused by the "Kok Ilang" twist of event.

Little did anyone know, his father,  is a very wealthy man who controls multiple organizations which deploys multiple specialist which are known for never failing their task. Soon, he began to deploy all of the specialist to  search all the timelines and retrieve back his son despite the universe's condition and setting reward for any specialist who are able to bring back his son.

The problem are then complicated even further when it is announced to the specialist that whoever retrieve his son back will be rewarded with 1 million token. 

Now, all the specialists are going head-on on an all out war battle with other specialist in order to keep all the tokens for themselves.

Still reading this? 

What are you waiting for? Hurry download the game and rush to the battlefield! Those token are yours and yours alone to keep!
